scripts.setup: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote && cd strudel && git stash && git checkout main && git pull && cd .. && git commit -a -m 'Updated Strudel from origin.'
scripts.build-strudel: python3 patch-strudel.py && cd strudel && pnpm run setup && pnpm run build
scripts.build: pnpm run build-strudel && vite build && cp -rf strudel/website/dist/* . && rm CNAME && pandoc -s cloud-5.css --ascii=true README.md -o index.html && python3 patch-dist.py && pnpm run jsdoc && pnpm run package
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && rm -rf ~/gogins.github.io/_astro && rm -rf ~/gogins.github.io/assets && cp -rf cloud-5/* ~/gogins.github.io/ && pandoc -s cloud-5.css --ascii=true README.md --metadata title='cloud-5' -o ~/gogins.github.io/cloud-5.html && pandoc -s cloud-5.css --ascii=true public/README.md --metadata title='cloud-music' -o ~/gogins.github.io/index.html
